nodes.text: Indentured servitude was a form of contract in which an individual agreed to work without salary for a lender, selling their labor and freedom of movement for a set period of time—usually no fewer than seven years and sometimes up to three decades. The members of the Hutt species built entire industries off of such practices. During the High Republic Era, indentures were authorized within the Galactic Republic, with only a few legal limits. For example, indentured servants could not be required to risk their own lives in the service of their lender. Although not as bad as slavery, that system still left people trapped for years in a life of unceasing and unrewarded labor.
